head.supplied: 11/11/87. ¶ ¶ If ¶ you ¶ called round, dear Mr Macdonald, on Sir William and Mr Joseph Clarke, they perhaps or some other rich men, like Dr Mein ¶ or Sir James McBain might make up the £100 on an ...

div.p: A38 Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Vic. Branch) papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

If you called round, dear Mr Macdonald, on Sir William and Mr Joseph Clarke, they perhaps or some other rich men, like Dr Mein
George Augustus Mein? or Sir James McBain might make up the £100 on an understanding that a geogr feature be named after them.
M was seeking funds for the Royal Geographical Society of Australasia's proposed exploring expedition in Central Australia; see M to S. Davenport, 9 November 1887. You could kindly ask them in my name, they are all near you,
